mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT L.LCTRE_NO , L.LCTRE_NMPR , L.PRFSOR_NO , L.COURSE_NO , L.SEMSTR_SE , K.SEMSTR_YR , K.SEMSTR , (SELECT A.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE A WHERE A.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC015' AND A.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE , (SELECT B.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE B WHERE B.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC014' AND B.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE , (SELECT F.FCLTS_NM FROM FACILITIES F WHERE F.FCLTS_NO = L.FCLTS_NO) FCLTS_NM , (SELECT O.BULD_NM FROM BUILDING O, FACILITIES F WHERE O.BULD_NO = F.BULD_NO AND F.FCLTS_NO = L.FCLTS_NO) BULD_NM , U.COURSE_NM , U.COURSE_PNT , (SELECT N.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE N WHERE N.COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC011' AND N.COM_CODE = V.TMTB_SE ) TMTB_SE
FROM LECTURE L INNER JOIN SEMESTER K ON (K.SEMSTR_NO = L.SEMSTR_SE) INNER JOIN COURSE U ON (L.COURSE_NO = U.COURSE_NO) INNER JOIN LECTURE_TIMETABLE V ON (L.LCTRE_NO = V.LCTRE_NO)
WHERE L.PRFSOR_NO= #{prfsorNo} AND K.SEMSTR_YR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND K.SEMSTR = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')) BETWEEN 1 AND 6 AND K.SEMSTR = 1 THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')) BETWEEN 7 AND 12 AND K.SEMSTR = 2 THEN 2 END ORDER BY TMTB_SE ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO TEST_ANSWER_PAPER (TEST_QUES_NO,TEST_SE,LCTRE_NO,TEST_ASWPER) VALUES (#{item.testQuesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.testSe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.testAswper,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC021' AND CC.COM_CODE =T.TEST_SE ) TEST_SE_NM , T.TEST_SE , Q.LCTRE_NO , Q.ATCH_FILE_NO , Q.TEST_QUST_TIME , (SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC015' AND CC.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE , L.PRFSOR_NO , L.SEMSTR_SE , (SELECT AA.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE AA WHERE AA.com_code_grp = 'SEC014' AND AA.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE FROM TEST T INNER JOIN TEST_QUESTION Q ON (Q.TEST_SE = T.TEST_SE AND Q.LCTRE_NO = T.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (Q.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) WHERE L.PRFSOR_NO=#{prfsorNo} AND L.LCTRE_NO=#{lctreNo}

SELECT C.CR_NO ,C.CR_SE ,C.CR_TITLE ,C.CR_CN ,C.CR_WRTER ,C.CR_DATE ,C.ATCH_FILE_NO ,C.LCTRE_NO ,(SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC015' AND CC.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE ,L.SEMSTR_SE ,(SELECT AA.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE AA WHERE AA.com_code_grp = 'SEC014' AND AA.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE ,L.PRFSOR_NO FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD C INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (C.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) WHERE C.CR_SE = '01' AND C.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND L.PRFSOR_NO =#{prfsorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY C.CR_DATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC021' AND CC.COM_CODE =T.TEST_SE ) TEST_SE_NM , Q.LCTRE_NO , Q.ATCH_FILE_NO , Q.TEST_QUST_TIME , T.TEST_SE , (SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC015' AND CC.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE , L.PRFSOR_NO , (SELECT SUBSTR(SEMSTR_SE,1,4) FROM DUAL) SEMSTR_SE_YEAR , (SELECT SUBSTR(SEMSTR_SE,5,1) FROM DUAL) SEMSTR_SE_SEMSTR , (SELECT AA.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE AA WHERE AA.com_code_grp = 'SEC014' AND AA.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE , SUBSTR(H.ATCH_FILE_NM, INSTR(H.ATCH_FILE_NM, '.', -1)) MIME_TYPE , H.ATCH_FILE_STRE_NM , H.ATCH_FILE_MIME_TYPE , H.ATCH_FILE_STRE_PATH
FROM TEST_QUESTION Q INNER JOIN TEST T ON (Q.TEST_SE = T.TEST_SE) INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (Q.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN ATTACHING_FILE H ON (Q.ATCH_FILE_NO=H.ATCH_FILE_NO) WHERE T.TEST_SE =#{testSe} AND L.PRFSOR_NO=#{prfsorNo} AND L.LCTRE_NO=#{lctreNo}

SELECT DISTINCT Q.TEST_SE , Q.LCTRE_NO , Q.ATCH_FILE_NO , P.STDNT_NO , I.STDNT_NM , I.STDNT_TELNO , R.SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE , R.SKNRG_STTUS_MAJOR1 , C.SUBJCT_NM
FROM TEST_QUESTION Q INNER JOIN SUBMIT_ANSWER_PAPER P ON (Q.LCTRE_NO = P.LCTRE_NO AND Q.TEST_SE = P.TEST_SE) INNER JOIN STUDENT S ON (S.STDNT_NO = P.STDNT_NO) INNER JOIN STUDENT_INFORMATION I ON (I.STDNT_NO = S.STDNT_NO) INNER JOIN SCHOOL_REGISTER_STATUS R ON (R.STDNT_NO = I.STDNT_NO) INNER JOIN SUBJECT C ON (C.SUBJCT_NO = R.SKNRG_STTUS_MAJOR1) WHERE Q.TEST_SE = #{testSe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND Q.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY R.SKNRG_STTUS_GRADE
SELECT ATCH_FILE_NO, ATCH_FILE_SN, ATCH_FILE_NM, ATCH_FILE_STRE_NM, ATCH_FILE_STRE_PATH, ATCH_FILE_MG, ATCH_FILE_INDICT_MG, ATCH_FILE_MIME_TYPE FROM ATTACHING_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = #{ATCHFILENO}

SELECT C.CR_NO ,C.CR_SE ,C.CR_TITLE ,C.CR_CN ,C.CR_WRTER ,C.CR_DATE ,C.ATCH_FILE_NO ,C.LCTRE_NO ,(SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC015' AND CC.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE ,L.SEMSTR_SE ,(SELECT AA.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE AA WHERE AA.com_code_grp = 'SEC014' AND AA.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE ,L.PRFSOR_NO FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD C INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (C.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) WHERE C.CR_SE ='03' AND C.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND L.PRFSOR_NO =#{prfsorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY C.CR_DATE DESC

SELECT C.CR_NO ,C.CR_SE ,C.CR_TITLE ,C.CR_CN ,C.CR_WRTER ,C.CR_DATE ,C.ATCH_FILE_NO ,C.LCTRE_NO ,(SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC015' AND CC.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE ,L.SEMSTR_SE ,(SELECT AA.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE AA WHERE AA.com_code_grp = 'SEC014' AND AA.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE ,L.PRFSOR_NO FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD C INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (C.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) WHERE C.CR_SE ='04' AND C.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND L.PRFSOR_NO =#{prfsorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY C.CR_DATE DESC

SELECT C.CR_NO , C.CR_SE , C.CR_TITLE , C.CR_CN , C.CR_WRTER , C.CR_DATE , C.ATCH_FILE_NO , C.LCTRE_NO , (SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC015' AND CC.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE , L.SEMSTR_SE , (SELECT AA.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE AA WHERE AA.com_code_grp = 'SEC014' AND AA.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE , L.PRFSOR_NO FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD C INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (C.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO)
WHERE C.CR_NO = #{crNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT C.CR_NO , C.CR_SE , C.CR_TITLE , C.CR_CN , C.CR_WRTER , C.CR_DATE , C.ATCH_FILE_NO , C.LCTRE_NO , (SELECT CC.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE CC WHERE CC.com_code_grp = 'SEC015' AND CC.COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE , L.SEMSTR_SE , (SELECT AA.COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE AA WHERE AA.com_code_grp = 'SEC014' AND AA.COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE , L.PRFSOR_NO , U.COURSE_NM , U.COURSE_PNT
FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD C INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (C.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN COURSE U ON (L.COURSE_NO = U.COURSE_NO) WHERE C.CR_NO = #{crNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
